name: zsh-apr
author: Yuu Yamashita, Sam Stephenson, Mislav MarohniÄ‡, Josh Friend

default.atclone: ziextract --move --auto; +zi-message 'Building Apache Portable Runtime...'; ./configure --prefix='$ZPFX' >/dev/null && make >/dev/null && +zi-message 'Installing Apache Portable Runtime to $ZPFX...' && make install >/dev/null && +zi-message '{ok}Installation of Apache Portable Runtime succeeded{rst}' || +zi-message '{error}Installation of Apache Portable Runtime failed{rst}'
